sn45.22:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you skillful and unskillful qualities.
sn45.22:1.5: They are wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.22:1.8: They are right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
